resources.string: Already have an account? Sign in here!

The Stray Cat Sterilisation Programme is a new collaborative venture between the SPCA and AVS (Animal & Veterinary Service) which aims to further reduce the number of stray cats in Housing and Development Board (HDB) estates

Community cat feeders can contact the SPCA at 62875355 (extension 14) to make an appointment. 

 Please have the following information ready when you call: 

 Full name, address, NRIC/ FIN number and contact number of community caregiver 

 Number of cats needing to be sterilised 

 The sex of each cat 

 The area (neighbourhood) where the cat is from
